analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0xddd460bbd9f79847ea08681563e8a9696867210c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/2/0xddd460bbd9f79847ea08681563e8a9696867210c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_startTime' of Tokenlock.freezeTime (/unique_chucks/2/0xddd460bbd9f79847ea08681563e8a9696867210c.sol#136-137) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_endTime' of Tokenlock.freezeTime (/unique_chucks/2/0xddd460bbd9f79847ea08681563e8a9696867210c.sol#137-138) is not in mixedCase
